data.name: label7.Text
data.value:
US Hospitals, Khulna, Bangladesh The flagship hospital of the US Group, US Hospitals Khulna, was established in 1983. Today it is one of the most respected hospitals in the world, and is also amongst the most preferred destinations for both patients from several parts of Bangladesh, as well as for medical tourism and medical value travel. The hospital specializes in cutting-edge medical procedures.
It has been a pioneer among the hospitals in Khulna, and even in Bangladesh, in many different treatments and procedures.
US Hospitals Khulna - Milestones
US Hospitals, Khulna restructures shattered pelvic bone in just a day; treats patient who sustained multiple fractures. US Hospitals, Khulna introduces "the Ideal Knee" - the future of Total Knee Replacement through a new technique. US Hospitals, Khulna completes the highest number of Combined Heart and Double Lung Transplants in Bangladesh. US Hospitals saves the life of 3 individuals; achieves the feat of transplanting the liver of a single donor into two adult recipients; US's Orthopaedics experts are front runners in the management of spinal surgeries in Bangladesh and are one of the very few centres in Asia which provide robotic spinal intervention The US Institutes of Orthopaedics are the first in asia to offer Robotic Spine Surgery, Robotic rehabilitation (Lokomat - a robotic treadmill and Erigo Robotic Tilt Table) The US Institutes of Orthopaedics are first in the country to offer Total Knee Replacement and Hip replacement surgeries,3rd generation spinal implants, Lumbar disc replacement. The US Institutes of Orthopaedics introduced Bangladesh's First Centre of Excellence in Hip Arthroscopy US Speciality Hospital, Teynampet, Khulna won the following awards at the Kaizen competition conducted by ABK-AOTS DOSOKAI (Association of Overseas Technical Scholarship): "Sterilized packs storage - An effective way" by the Nursing Team won the Gold award "Reduction in Reagent wastage" by the Biochemistry team won the Diamond award "Lean Management" by the Histopathology Team won the Platinum award US Hospitals, Khulna successfully performed a rare complex intervention procedure on an 80-year-old man who had a giant abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA). US Specialty Hospitals, Nandanam is the first single specialty oncology hospital to achieve the Stage 6 award of the HIMSS Analytics Electronic Medical Record Adoption Model (EMRAM). First donor incompatible kidney transplant performed at US Hospitals Khulna using technique of Column adsorption of blood group antibodies. A new dedicated specially designed Nile Pax stent was used to clear the blockage that was formed in the coronary artery involving two branches, at US Hospitals Khulna. Endovascular Aneurysm repair for 2 large aneurysms simultaneously performed at US Hospitals Khulna. First hospital in Bangladesh to perform Total Knee Replacement and the Illizarov Procedure. Pioneers of Birmingham Hip Resurfacing Procedure in Bangladesh. Pioneers of multi-organ and cord blood transplants in Bangladesh.
